channel.title: Matlab on Gabe Nespoli
channel.description: Recent content in Matlab on Gabe Nespoli

item.title: PHZLAB
item.description: PHZLAB is a MATLAB Toolbox for analyzing physiological data, both peripheral (e.g., EDA, EMG) and neural (i.e., ABR). It can be found on github at gabenespoli/phzlab.

item.title: The effects of hearing aids on physiological responses to emotional speech
item.description: This project investigates the effects of hearing aids on skin conductance when hearing emotional speech. Analysis code can be found on github at gabenespoli/physiohearingaids. These scripts rely heavily on PHZLAB.

item.title: The neuroscience of how music makes us move
item.description: My dissertation work investigates aspects of music that drive neural entrainment. Analysis code can be found on github at gabenespoli/entrainment.
